Sam Donnelly

Constant Field Values

otuIdx

private final java.util.Map<OTU,java.lang.Integer> otuIdx
The inverse of otus: it's an OTU->rowNumber lookup.

otus

private final java.util.List<OTU> otus
The position of an OTU in otus signifies its row number in row. So otus is a rowNumber-> OTU lookup.

Cascade-saved through this.otuSet.

otuSet

private OTUSet otuSet
These are the OTUs whose data comprises this CharacterStateMatrix.

characterIdx

private final java.util.Map<Character,java.lang.Integer> characterIdx
The inverse of characters. So it's a Character ->columnNumber lookup.

characters

private final java.util.List<Character> characters
The position of a Character in characters signifies its column number in each row. So characters is a columnNumber-> Character lookup.

rows

private final java.util.List<CharacterStateRow> rows

setCharacter

public Character setCharacter(int characterIdx,
                              Character character)
Set the Character at characterIdx.

If getCharacters().size() <= characterIdx, then this method pads getCharacters() with nulls.

If character was already contained in this matrix, then its former position is filled in with null.

Parameters:
characterIdx - index
character - value
Returns:
the Character previously at that position or null if there was no such Character

Returns:

this matrix

setOTUs

public CharacterStateMatrix setOTUs(java.util.List<OTU> newOtus)
Order the OTUs of this.getOTUSet(). In other words, set the order of the rows in this CharacterStateMatrix.

This method operates on the rows and reorders them appropriately, filling in null values for newly introduced OTUs. These null'd OTUs must be filled in by the client.

A copy of newOtus is made so subsequent modifications of newOTUs will have no affect on this matrix.

Assumes all members of newOtus are not Hibernate-detached.

Parameters:
newOtus - order of the OTUSet associated with this CharacterStateMatrix
Returns:
this CharacterStateMatrix
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the members of otus are not the same as those of this CharacterStateMatrix's associated OTUSet

setOTUSet

OTUSet setOTUSet(OTUSet otuSet)
Setter. Intentionally package-private and meant to be called from OTUSet.

Parameters:
otuSet - new OTUSet for this matrix. nullable.
Returns:
otuSet

setRow

public CharacterStateRow setRow(int index,
                                CharacterStateRow row)
Set row at index to row. Fills with nulls if index is too big.

If row is already in this matrix, this method sets that position to null.

Assumes row does not belong to another matrix.

Assumes row is not detached.

Parameters:
index - see description
row - see description
Returns:
the CharacterStateRow that was previously there, or null if there was no CharacterStateRow previously there
